attributes.action: stop religion,boko haram crisis leading to bombing public, private and market places and churches  all types of places of worships  in Nigeria
attributes.additional_details: There had been series of bombing of homes villages and others in all parts of towns and cities and rural places in Nigeria in the last five  years by aggrieved individuals, politicians, power to rule people and international countries who suffer losses on investments.Security of lifes and properties is no longer controlled and managed well by citizens and all arms of government bodies having responsibilities for well-beings of populaces.Poverty.Life struggling burdensome on women,babies  health, children, youths employments, elders  over 40's  No hope for end to terrorism, anti- social behaviors.corruptions in homes and society  The collape of prosperity and peaceful co existence is economically bad for both Nigeria and the international countries. aid all suffering, Nigerians. No water, eletricity.cctv for all places
